resources.string: The entered URL is not valid.
Battery level of printer is low.\n
Please check the connection of the printer and the mobile terminal.\nConnection get lost.\n
Please release a paper feed switch.\n
Please remove jammed paper and close roll paper cover.\nRemove any jammed paper or foreign substances in the printer, and then turn the printer off and turn the printer on again.\n
Then, If the printer doesn\'t recover from error, please cycle the power switch.\n
Please cycle the power switch of the printer.\nIf same errors occurred even power cycled, the printer may out of order.
Please wait until error LED of the printer turns off. \n
Print head of printer is hot.\n
Motor Driver IC of printer is hot.\n
Please connect AC adapter or change the battery.\nBattery of printer is almost empty.\n
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
